meanings.definition: A medication used to treat depression.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed antidepressions to help with my sadness.
meanings.sent2: She takes antidepressions every morning to feel better.
meanings.sent3: The antidepressions made the clouds in her mind disappear.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like a ray of sunshine after taking the antidepressions.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of antidepressions was a beacon of hope on her nightstand.

meanings.definition: A therapy or treatment aimed at alleviating symptoms of depression.
meanings.sent1: Group sessions are part of the antidepressions offered at the clinic.
meanings.sent2: Her weekly antidepressions include yoga and meditation.
meanings.sent3: Laughter was the best antidepressions during their comedy night.
meanings.sent4: The support group was an emotional antidepressions for everyone.
meanings.sent5: The art therapy class served as a creative antidepressions for the patients.
